title: Recycling of non-product outputs containing rare elements originating in nanomaterial syntheses
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,684-687
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00795B, Perspective
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lucas Reijnders
Recycling of non-product outputs containing substantial amounts of rare elements originating in nanomaterial syntheses is relatively attractive as rare elements tend to be more valuable than abundant elements.
